      Subclasses of MessageSource in org.js4ms.amt.gateway 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AmtDatagramSource
      A MessageSource that constructs an AMT multicast endpoint to forward datagrams sent to a specific port and one or more any-source or source-specific addresses.

    • Uses of MessageSource in org.js4ms.io.net

      Subclasses of MessageSource in org.js4ms.io.net 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UdpDatagramPayloadSource
      A MessageSource that receives UDP packets via a UdpEndpoint and sends the datagram payload to an OutputChannel.
      class  UdpDatagramSource
      A MessageSource that receives UDP datagrams via a UdpEndpoint and sends the datagram to an OutputChannel.
